contentencoded:
In some cases, what you do on social media could affect your ability to borrow money. That means, even your credit score. Paddy Hirsch Marketplace's Senior Producer of personal finance at Marketplace joins Marketplace Morning host David Brancaccio to discuss. 

Click the audio player above to hear more.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Wednesday, September 4, 2013
teaser: They say be careful what you post on social media What you do on Facebook could affect your credit score.

title: Do your Facebook friends affect your credit score?
